title: Certificates of origin (preferential/non-preferential)
dataVerified: Exporter, importer, goods description, origin country, certifying authority
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake certificates of origin (tariff fraud). Domain binding verifies chamber of commerce/issuing authority. Free trade agreement compliance (USMCA, EU FTA). Preferential duty rates. Prevents origin fraud.
